examples.description: Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2014-01-01 -> And they are running payroll in the 2017 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a 20 year old Director payroll profile calculated on the annual basis with NI letter M -> And they are paid £4000 monthly -> When running month 10 payroll they turn 21 so change to letter A -> And they run payroll in month 12 -> Then total employee NIC should be £4292.80 -> And total employer NIC should be £1656.00
